projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: The project I created as a portfolio site. It has links to all my other works. The project has a lot of nice details like different themes, project sorting and other

projects.name: UMR Group App
projects.description: The web application is for UMR Business Group. I realized the form with counting the price which depends on options, the date and the time. Also, there is a possibility of adding feedbacks.

projects.name: Responsive site
projects.description: Responsive HTML layout portfolio of a man. Here I used Webpack to compile SASS.

projects.name: swipe-mobile
projects.description: NPM package for handling swipes on mobile devices. It allows you to handle the callback for the swipe direction

projects.name: A+ Studio
projects.description: The adaptive site design. It was written to practice developing sites without UI libraries

projects.name: DSI Technology
projects.description: It is an example of basic adaptive html layout. Gulp and SASS were used. My first application where Gulp was used

projects.name: Go Corona
projects.description: The adaptive website about coronavirus. In site, I created beautiful menu burger

projects.name: Cattia Business Center
projects.description: The site is for CATTIA Business Canter in Brasov, Romania. I used swiper.js to create a carousel of the photos. The practice of standart site developing

projects.name: Papa Grill Landing
projects.description: This site is a landing of the company. It helps to open and manage restaurants, allows you to use their name for having clients. Generally, you get restaurant and part of profit, they get new restaurant to the collection and also a part of profit

projects.name: Homework tracker
projects.description: The application which helps you to track and check your hometasks, look after them. You can add courses, add tasks in some courses then do them and mark it.

projects.name: Target Tracker
projects.description: This application helps you to achieve goals! You can add topics and then take challenge on. Also, there is a possibility to write description for a target. The targets are filtered by period (week, month or year) so you are able to take different goals on at the same time

projects.name: Training Tracker
projects.description: The application helps you to plan your trainings more effectively! Here you can push trainings to today list and then check the calendar. There you will be able to check which exercises you did each day, how often you do them and so on. Then it will help you to normalize your schedule and you will not need to keep all it in your mind!
